name: part_000
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introductory animation sequence with a board game theme, setting the stage for the birthday 3D live.
Aki Rosenthal begins her 3D live performance with the song 'Bitter Choco Decoration'.
scenes.song_name: Bitter Choco Decoration (ビターチョコデコレーション)

subtitles.original:
ビターチョコデコレーション
作詞・作曲：syudou
subtitles.english:
Bitter Choco Decoration
Lyrics/Composition: syudou

subtitles.original: 人混みに馴染まないように
subtitles.english: So as not to blend in with the crowd

subtitles.original: 愛されないように
subtitles.english: So as not to be loved

subtitles.original: 期待しないように
subtitles.english: So as not to have expectations

subtitles.original: かと言って角が立たないように
subtitles.english: But also so as not to cause any friction

subtitles.original: 気取らぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to be pretentious

subtitles.original: 目立たぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to stand out

subtitles.original: 誰一人傷つけぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to hurt a single person

subtitles.original: 虐めぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to bully

subtitles.original: 殺さぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to kill

subtitles.original: かと言って正体がバレないように
subtitles.english: But also so as not to let my true nature be exposed

subtitles.original: 威張らぬように
subtitles.english: So as not to be arrogant

subtitles.original: 軽いジョークやリップサービスも忘れるように
subtitles.english: So as to forget even light jokes and lip service

subtitles.original: どんな時も笑って愛嬌振りまくように
subtitles.english: So as to always smile and scatter charm around

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: とにかく言わずもがな召し上がれ
subtitles.english: Anyway, it goes without saying, please help yourself

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration

subtitles.original: 不和と嫌いはちゃんと直さなきゃ
subtitles.english: Discord and dislikes must be properly fixed

subtitles.original: 頭空っぽその後に
subtitles.english: After the head is empty

subtitles.original: 残る心が本物なら
subtitles.english: If the heart that remains is the real thing

subtitles.original: きっと君だって同じこと
subtitles.english: Surely, you are the same

subtitles.original: さあところで一つ伺いますが
subtitles.english: Now, by the way, I have one question

subtitles.original: 全ては...
subtitles.english: Everything is...
